  • Field Details

    • id

      private Long id
      The unique identifier for the message. Generated automatically.

    • sentDate

      private LocalDateTime sentDate
      The date and time when the message was sent. Cannot be updated once set.

    • messageIsRead

      private Boolean messageIsRead
      Indicates whether the message has been read. Can be updated.

    • messageContent

      private String messageContent
      The content of the message. Cannot be updated once set.

    • sender

      private UserEntity sender
      The user who sent the message. Many-to-one relationship with `UserEntity`.

    • receiver

      private UserEntity receiver
      The user who received the message. Many-to-one relationship with `UserEntity`.
